lead_paragraph: The former New York City Marathon champions Martin Lel and Rodgers Rop, each of Kenya, will be back for the 38th running of the race on Nov. 4. Joining the 2003 champion Lel and the 2002 winner Rop in the field will be last year’s second-place finisher, Stephen Kiogora of Kenya, and the London Marathon runner-up, Abderrahim Goumri of Morocco.
